About this Application

This application is a personal playground for experimenting with code. Here, you can flex your programming muscles by trying out different programs. Feel free to modify the code, test it out, and save your changes. Do not forget to give your program a unique name!

Features

  • Write and run code in four programming languages
  • Save your programs and access them later
The links lead to compiler pages for the respective languages, these pages by default contain some sample code
We would prefer you use some device with a physical keyboard like a desktop, laptop or a tablet with a keyboard attachment, Phones should be fine but not as optimal
You can write and save a total of twenty programs, five from each of the four available languages
No, if you want to save code entered you will have to click the save buttons provided in the compiler pages Otherwise if you refresh or go to dashboard without you will loose progress
These are just sample programs intended to be a template for you to edit

Implemented by CMRIT 2023 Students - Sriram and Vibhav
